import React from 'react'; const Form = props => { const {myForm, error, onChangeHandler, submitHandler, unique} = props; return( <>
{ error.petName ? {error.petName.message} : "" } {error ? unique.message : ""}
{ error.type ? {error.type.message} : "" }
{ error.description ? {error.description.message} : "" }

Skills (optional):

); } export default Form;
